data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Cebu, Philippines.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cebu, Philippines
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Cebu, Philippines to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Cebu, Philippines to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Cebu, Philippines.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Iranun people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Cebu.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Cebu, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.section_summary:
the state of Cebu, Philippines has a population of 6,398,600.

We estimate Cebu has 891,312 people who might know Jesus, 4,929,193 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 578,094 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Cebu, Philippines today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
